title: (17820) Banyoles - 28 Carretera Figueres
description: Wide area to park without problems and visit the lake. 5 minutes walking.

title: (17820) Banyoles - 210 Carrer de la Sardana
description: Parking near the lake (2 minutes).

title: (17820) Banyoles - 19 Passeig de la Draga
description: water point

title: (17820) Banyoles - 43 Passeig Lluís Maria Vidal
description: In between the two paid swimming areas. (I just jumped in between) Nice and quiet with a spot. Easy to access bathroom at the inside the rowing club.

title: (17820) Banyoles - 36 Carrer de la Barca
description: Along the lake, lots of free parking spaces

title: (17820) Banyoles - 19 Passeig de la Draga
description: Parking next to Lake Banyoles. Picnic with table and water fountain, very nice place to visit the lake

title: (17820) Banyoles - Carrer de Sant Martirià
description: Ground parking with a gazebo overlooking the beautiful lake. A bit of a daytime ride for hikers and cyclists, close to the road.

title: (17834) Porqueres - 11 Diseminado PORQUERES2 Circumval·laci
description: General mixed parking next to the Porqueres church. No overnight

name: Càmping El Llac
title: (17820) Càmping El Llac
description: Very nice campsite. Nice hike around Lake Banyoles. Typical market downtown. Small train that brings to the center of the campsite

title: (17834) Porqueres - 100 GIV-5248
description: Day parking. Possibility of starting a hiking trail.

title: (17834) Porqueres - 31 GI-524
description: Great parking, quite shaded. Flat land. Cars and motorhomes. Only by day. 5 'walk from the lake. With picnic tables and garbage. Free. Good option

title: (17834) Porqueras -
description: Small parking lot at the end of the dirt road under the large oak trees. starting point for hiking and mountain biking, and close to the marsh for bird watching. Accessibility of the lake 2 min walk.

title: (17834) Porqueres - 0 S N Carretera Paratge Frigolet
title_short: (17834) Porqueres - 0 S N Carretera Paratge Frigolet
description: Large car park at Porqueres. Next to camping El llac. Flat gravel terrain.

title: (17834) Porqueres - 10 Diseminado PORQUERES2 Mieres
description: Just to make a stopover.

title: (17834) Usall - 11 Diseminado Usall
description: Next to the cemetery but very quiet, surrounded by nature. Very good access to

title: (17844) Cornellà del Terri - 25 Diseminado Pujals dels Cavallers
title_short: (17844) Cornellà del Terri - 25 Diseminado Pujals dels Cavallers
description: Gravel parking lot by the road, rather in nature

title: (17844) Cornellà del Terri - GI-513
description: Stop to rest and sleep, you fear in a macimo and there is a gap, near the road. quiet. please take your trash

title: (17852) Serinyà - C-66
description: Picnic area, next to the park of Serinya caves. Spent the night without problem, hidden from the road, and in the shade all day! To access it, go to the back of the park's coach parking lot, and go around the little bridge at the bottom of the meadow, behind are the picnic tables and the bivouac! Just a little noise from the road, and some cyclists on the small path of the edge ... On the other hand, to our dismay, the cave park is only open daily in July and August, if not the rest of the year open only on weekends ...

title: (17834) Porqueres - 35 Diseminado PORQUERES2 Paratge
description: Forest parking with sculptures...quiet place always open and very nice to sleep...don't forget to visit the forest full of sculptures.

title: (17834) Pujarnol - 11 Carretera Pujarnol
description: Pujarnol tower. An ancient fortress dating back to the year 1200 from which you can see the sea, it currently houses a rural community immersed in the forest where 9 adults and 5 children live between the heart of Pla de l'Estany and the region of La Garrotxa. Particular place with a bell tower that was an old Torrevigía. We love having visitors! For this we have the following options: - Area for vans/motorhomes... - Camping area - Hostel (10 places) - During your stay whatever your option To sleep, you can enjoy a covered outdoor kitchen with fridge, barbecue, covered multipurpose room (former barn), solar showers, conventional shower, dry toilets distributed in different spaces, conventional and square bathroom. If you feel like it, you can join our community vegetarian/vegan lunches (at 1:00 p.m.) with products from our vegetable garden, chicken coop and Km0 cooperatives. You do NOT need to let us know if you would like to stay overnight in a van as we have plenty of space to accommodate you.

title: (17843) Palol de Revardit - GIV-5147
description: Parking in front of the newly renovated castle. Very calm ! Near the highway. With a drinking water fontaine at the other side of the road next to the playground. There is a board where you can see the different short walks the City Hall offers. While walking one of them, we saw longer routes and bike routes signs...

name: Fangaventura
title: (17831) Fangaventura
description: Closed. It is not possible to stay the night.

name: Lareggae
title: (17468) Lareggae
description: The place is in the middle of the nature of Vilademuls, it is a place where you can breathe peace and tranquility, in the facilities there is a very original food truck inspired by reggae where you can eat some fabulous sandwiches (smash burger, vegetarian hamburger, suckling pig, falafel, assorted tapas) and listen to live music; from soundsystem, jam sessions, shows etc. There are toilets, a space to park campers and caravans. Fabulous saltwater pool.

name: Camping Esponellà.
title: (17832) Camping Esponellà.
description: We stumbled upon this place looking for a cozy place to rest from our journey and we weren't disappointed! Large pitches (we took the premium ones with electricity and water included) and immersed in nature, in this season, a very quiet place, you can only hear the birds singing. Plenty of possible activities: tennis, miniature golf, swimming pool (indoor and outdoor), volleyball, kayaking, fishing... The river just a stone's throw away is a delight. We highly recommend bringing your bike as the surroundings are worth exploring. Possibility of black water discharge in a special toilet, garbage and white water discharge just outside the structure. Very good restaurant with small corner shop. In the nearby village there is a restaurant and a small shop with bread and fruit. In summary, we had a great time, heaven!

title: (17831) Sant Martí de Campmajor - 23A Diseminado Sant Miquel de Campmajor
title_short: (17831) Sant Martí de Campmajor - 23A Diseminado Sant Miquel de Campmajor
description: Car park where you can park Ac during the day without problems.

name: Càmping La Vall de Campmajor
title: (17831) Càmping La Vall de Campmajor
description: Small and family campsite. It has a small farm with rabbits and chickens and a playground for the little ones. Very quiet place and in a good area to visit both Banyoles and Fageda d'en Jordà.

title: (17843) Palol de Revardit - GIV-5191
description: Easy access. Land parking in Sant Marti.

title: (17843) Riudellots de la Creu - 5 Poblado Riudellots de la Creu
title_short: (17843) Riudellots de la Creu - 5 Poblado Riudellots de la Creu
description: Parking with a children's park near Girona capital and the Banyoles swamp. Very quiet area surrounded by nature.

title: (17199) Biert - Unnamed Road
description: Level esplanade on the mountain. you can stay overnight without problem. views from the viewpoint near the monastery, bouldering areas, routes and mountain biking. There is no service whatsoever and it is a secluded area with no one to bother you.

title: (17199) Biert - Unnamed Road
description: Place on the side of a little traveled road. Cyclists and hikers pass early but it is a very quiet area with good views.

title: (17831) Sant Miquel de Campmajor - GIV-5246
description: Church parking very quiet. Very calm. Next door there are two iron swings for children.

title: (17850) Sant Ferriol - Camí de Juïnyà
description: Near some farms and by the side of a quiet road, with many trees and plenty of shade. Only some areas are flat, probably enough for 4 vans. The rest can be adjusted using leveling. Not really suitable for big campervan because of limited space of manoeuvre and low trees. There's also a  flat concrete slab that can be used for cooking of whatever else. Quite some hungry mosquitoes at sunset.

title: (17850) Sant Ferriol - C-66
description: Along a dirt road. several locations near the river No services just calm.

title: (17199) Canet d'Adri - 2 Avinguda de Rocacorba
description: Small park between two roads at the entrance to Canet d'Adri. It is very quiet, there are benches, tables and garbage. Ideal to come with animals. The police passed by several times and we were without any problem with tables and camping.

title: (17850) Besalú - C-66
description: Practical parking for visiting the surroundings but a lot of traffic, no shade, close proximity. A cafe and free toilets can be found at the end of the parking lot. Attention closed at night. The medieval city of Besalu is very nice. We stayed here for 2 night in November. Not far from the Garrotxa volcanoes

name: Camping Can Coromines
title: (17851) Camping Can Coromines
description: Can Coromines, small family run camping with lots of trees, grass and plenty of nature

title: (17850) Besalú - 4 Carretera de Girona
description: Quiet location and clean pitches. A few meters from the beautiful village of Besalu with a small train that will transport you to town in 50 minutes. To recommend

title: (17850) Besalú - Camí del Rec
description: Merendero by the river with magnificent views of the medieval village. We spent the night with another van without problem. Super quiet place, only the ducklings and the frogs that live there are heard. Nearby, inside the village, there is a public bath.

title: (17850) Besalú - 36 Carrer Comte Tallaferro
description: Parking for van and small car

title: (17850) Besalú - 31 Passeig Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer
description: Quiet area near the river and village with banks and trash. It is accessed by a forest track in good condition

title: (17830) Mieres - 7 Camí de la Font
description: Place / central parking in the village

name: Camping de Besalú
title: (17850) Camping de Besalú
description: Campsite a bit old but quite clean. The gentleman at the reception very friendly. In low season without a pool but affordable price. Half an hour walk from the town. Better by bike. Good option after reading the comments about robberies in town parking lots. They do not have to empty gray water.

title: (17850) Besalú - 6 Carrer de Sous
description: Any of the streets of this residential district of Besalú is quiet and you can park easily. Very well connected with the town.

title: (17830) Mieres - 2 Carrer de Sant Pere
description: A pàrquing near the sports center, with 3 picnic tables, soccer field, bathroom, water fountain, and a small one.

title: (17830) Mieres - GI-524
description: In a field 500 m from a small road with little traffic. Below facing a pine forest ideal for a lunch or a night. The sun comes over the forest. No service.

title: (17482) Sant Julià de Ramis - 28 Carrer Llevant
title_short: (17482) Sant Julià de Ramis - 28 Carrer Llevant
description: Water spring

title: (17482) San Julián de Ramis - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (17482) San Julián de Ramis - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Difficult access but very beautiful. Many mosquitoes here.

title: (17482) Medinyà -
description: Nice spot on the river outside of Girona with bench seats. A few pedestrians and several locals on weekends but all very peaceful. The access is either via a field through the forest or via a bridge through a rain channel (only when it's dry!!) very sunny. But there is also a place in the shade. Take your rubbish with you.

title: (17746) Cabanelles - N-260
description: It is a parking lot with a small table, ideal if you want to stop to rest, we did not spend the night.

title: (17850) Sant Ferriol - Unnamed Road
description: A perfect place for a picnic, but there are no camping signs, maximum tranquility, there is a playground and a soccer field. For the day only.

title: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
title_short: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
description: Superb spot to sleep peacefully and safely. Possibility of 2 vans or 2 small motorhomes, one behind the other. Flat and shady ground at the top of a mountain located next to an old church and the Iberian village, ideal to visit and enjoy to discover Girona which is superb! Leave the place clean.

title: (17483) Bàscara - 5 Carrer les Lleterias
description: The car park is part of the sports hall and the school, on weekends there is a large influx of people and on weekdays at school start and end times the car park is used to pick up and drop off children, as well as the school bus. park between lines.. thank you very much...

title: (17152) Sant Martí de Llémena - GI-531
description: Parking parking maximum 24 hours. Without services, only garbage. Well leveled and large. Next to the road, and near a verse farm, little traffic and does not smell bad despite the farm. A stream passes by the side. The green and nice location.

title: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
title_short: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
description: Parking Església Sants Metges, surrounded by greenery and forest and overlooking the area. We were very quiet, it is a very nice place.

title: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
title_short: (17481) Sant Julià de Ramis - Poblat Ibèric
description: Car park in the forest near the church. View of the region. A dozen places for van and motorhome. Is near a cemetery below but not directly visible.

title: (17007) Girona - 8 Carrer Embusteros
description: Simple, quiet parking lot. There are public, freely accessible toilets at the gas station nearby.

title: (17746) Cabanelles - 6 Carrer de l'Arc
description: Parking at the entrance of a small and quiet village, next to a social area. Next to a very little traveled road. Slightly uneven. There are no services, but the place is nice to rest. Better to take the garbage and not use the bins, as they may not be emptied every day.

title: (17153) Sant Martí de Llémena - GI-531
description: Beautiful luxury, with walking routes, quiet. does not suppose of services but good lujar

title: (17840) Sarriá de Ter - 101 N-IIa
description: Repsol gas dealers, sale and exchange of gas bottles, you can even buy an adapter for German connections if you don't have one, super friendly, easy communication thanks to Google translator :-) 1a service

title: (17154) Sant Esteve de Llémena - Unnamed Road
title_short: (17154) Sant Esteve de Llémena - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious place, where to spend the night without problems. Lots of shade and easy access.

title: (17850) Beuda -
description: Grand espace plat en pleine nature qui dépanne bien si le précédent est occupé. C'est une espèce de gravière. C'est calme

title: (17811) Santa Pau -
description: Not a very large halt next to a road with little traffic. About 3 vehicles fit at most, although it would be flat only for 2, placing them well. You don't have phone coverage. Mind you, it's under trees, so good shade.

title: (17850) Beuda -
description: Great place in the forest with some views of mountains. secluded. 1 group of Enduros, nobody else seen. The gravel road goes with VW T3 and Renault Kangoo. Not for mobile homes or large vans.

title: (17850) Beuda - GIV-5234
description: Level ground parking. Very nice views Without services

title: (17850) Bauda - GIV-5234
description: Spectacular area, surrounded by nature, with picnic tables, culumpios, soccer goals and baskets, water fountain and a large covered area (if it rains, great).

title: (17850) Beuda -
description: Good place for two vans. It has shade to eat. Access by dirt road through the Badua water reservoir.

title: (17007) Girona - 54 Avinguda de França
description: Self-service laundry. Hours from 7 a.m. to 9 p.m. It has 6 washing machines (8, 14 and 18kg) and 6 14kg dryers. There are vending machines for coffee and snacks. They also have a washer and dryer for pet clothes. Lots of free parking around, a large supermarket (Carrefour) and self-service gas station. Fast and efficient service, very good aroma in the clothes and the dryers with 20 minutes and at maximum dries everything very well.

title: (17476) Garrigàs - 35 AP-7
description:
Service area and Gas station with a free place for motorhomes to dump dirty water and refill with clean water.
With picnic tables and several lorries parked there for the night.

title: (17150) Sant Gregori - Unnamed Road
description: Dirt car park next to the Sant Gregori cemetery and a church, quite apart from the town and without prohibitions.

title: (17476) Garrigàs - 35 AP-7
description: Picnic area next to a roadside gas station. Next to the Repsol gas station, gray water can be drained. And in pump 7 there is a free water hose to use. You probably don't drink water. Shower available. ask for the key inside

title: (17300) Girona -
description: Next to the village fountain next to a currently dry stream. pretty rural town with stone houses, quiet. OVERNIGHT PROHIBITED.

title: (17853) - 2P Lloc Zona Industr Can Portella
description: Parking between the cemetery and the football field, not a great place but convenient to take a break or be close to the cabins of Argelaguer. There is water with a long pipe in the cemetery. Quiet during our stay in January!

title: (17153) Sant Martí de Llémena - GI-532
description: Quiet in nature, just a van.

title: (17462) Bordils - 16B Carrer Palagret
description: Next to it there is a bar and a soccer field. You can park day and night

title: (17007) Girona - Passeig de Feliu Matamala i Teixidor
title_short: (17007) Girona - Passeig de Feliu Matamala i Teixidor
description:
A parking lot not far from the city in a small lighted park.

Not necessarily a quiet place, but we were able to spend a night and a day here with our motorhome, which is over 7 meters long.

address.street: Passeig de Feliu Matamala i Teixidor

title: (17476) Vilajoan - E15
description: Service area on the AP7 / E15, behind the Cepsa petrol station. It is accessed by leaving the highway, by the truck route. Convenient for quickly emptying and getting back on the road. Drinking water available, truck drivers come to fill their bottles.

title: (17007) Girona - 30 Avinguda de França
description: Free parking next to the Mercadona

title: (17007) Girona - 46 Carrer Bullidors-domeny
description: Unpaved parking 3 km from the center of Girona - accessible on foot, by bike or by bus. Possibility of evacuation, drinking water. Located at the end of the airport runway, it is flown over until 11 p.m.

title: (17007) Girona - Carretera de Taialà
description: Free parking, good parking

title: (17007) Girona - 1 Rambla de Xavier Cugat
description: Large free parking on hard ground. Ability to stay overnight, a bit far from the city center, otherwise quiet location.

title: (17007) Girona - 45 Carrer de Fontajau
description: Parking next to the city of Fontejau.

title: (17007) Girona - 22 Avinguda del President Josep Tarradellas i Joan
title_short: (17007) Girona - 22 Avinguda del President Josep Tarradellas i Joan
description: Large tarmac free parking without any service, in front of the large basketball hall. Very convenient for visiting the city by bike. Several motorhomes parked with us that day. We were parked there all day without a problem.

address.street: 22 Avinguda del President Josep Tarradellas i Joan

title: (17007) Girona - 92 Carrer de Pedret
description: Free parking along the river and next to a bar 10 minutes walk from the cathedral. The spaces are not delimited so we went there with a Peugeot Boxer bike (6m). Frightened by the many comments on thefts and burglaries, we did not trust us to leave it in a large parking lot. We asked the other people who parked for information and they said it was better to get back to the camper before it got dark.

title: (17853) Argelaguer - 1 Plaça de l'Església
description: Parking near the church of Argelaguer. It is a flat parking lot with dirt floor. It has some shady spots. It is usually full of cars, but there is always a free spot. Ideal for mini campers

title: (17853) Argelaguer - 3 N-260z
description: Open parking, ideal for short stops.

title: (17007) Girona - 1 Carrer del Pont de La Barca
title_short: (17007) Girona - 1 Carrer del Pont de La Barca
description: Free parking, 10 to 15 minutes walk from the historic old town. In the back area it is quiet, partly shady, with no through traffic and barely visible from the residential buildings in the neighborhood. For Wohmobile rather not suitable, but you do not stand out with a smaller vehicle (eg VW T4, Vito...) and has its rest. Occasionally someone walks by with their dog or visitors to the adjoining restaurant may use the car park (if this one still exists). For accompanying children there is a small playground within sight.

address.street: 1 Carrer del Pont de La Barca

title: (17007) Girona - Passeig de la Devesa
description: Parking for van or van near the park and the historic center.

title: (17007) Girona - Pont de Pedret
description: Free parking. ideal for visiting gerone city.

title: (17150) Sant Gregori - Passeig de ľArgelaguet
description: -A large car park in the middle of nature, near the village of Sant Gregori (Gironès). -Food stores, supermarkets and restaurants within 1 km. -In summer (approx. June 15 to September 11) municipal swimming pool open (200 m). -Starting point for hiking routes and trails.

title: (17850) Beuda - Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont
title_short: (17850) Beuda - Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont
description: Beautiful little flat spot on the way up the mountain, the road is easy but very narrow, watch out for oncoming traffic, motorcycle & bikes, not recommend for AC but otherwise perfect. 150 m up  the road is a font with mountain water

address.street: Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont

title: (17001) Girona - 38 Passeig de la Devesa
description: Nice wide parking strip between the river and the Parc de la Devesa. (there's a smaller car park on the entrance, it's not that one, just follow the road where it shows a cul-de-sac /dead end sign). No parking Tuesdays and Saturdays as there's a market. Busy on nice days I imagine. Fresh water at several places in the park, but not near the parking. 10 minute walk to the old town.

title: (17772) Pols -
description: Place for about 5 ac's, quiet and shady. Many hiking trails.

title: (17772) Pols -
description: Small space for 2 van along a country road. a little noise related to the nearby autovia but it calms down from 8 p.m. peaceful night without disturbance

title: (17853) Argelaguer - 61P Carrer del Canigó
description: Ground parking Easy access 5 minutes from Garell Park. Calm set back from the road. No service

title: (17190) Salt - Unnamed Road
description: Public parking Pla de Socs in Salt in the park of les Ribes del Ter.Lonely place at night and crowded by day. Many mosquitoes in summer.

title: (17001) Girona - 35 Passeig de la Devesa
description: Clay parking without marking on the ground, free, good for motorhomes

title: (17007) Girona - 142 Carrer de Sant Daniel
description: Parking of the recreational area, very beautiful near Girona, equipped with picnic tables and barbecues. Shaded parking area. You have to walk about 200m from the parking lot to the area.

title: (17001) Girona - 12 Carrer del Riu Güell
description: Parking of the Devesa.

name: Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
title: (17001) Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas
description: The Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas is located in the Pasaje de Massaguer with location by means of the coordinates 41º59'03.2 "N and 02º48'50.1" E. Central and very well located to visit the city of Girona and its cultural heritage: the Cathedral, the neighborhood Jewish, the Arab baths, the Ramblas, the wall, the Devesa. It has 37 spaces with exclusive access for parking users, has personal assistance during working hours and is equipped with video surveillance and permanent lighting. There are intercom points inside and outside the area, to be able to communicate with the staff of the center. Parking users have differentiated health services for women, men and people with disabilities. The establishment allows you to spend the night and has a supply of drinking water, electric charge and evacuation, gray water and waste water and free WIFI service.

address.street: 14 Passatge Massaguer (Parking Vayreda Autocaravanas). Email: clientes@empark.com

title: (17001) Girona - 28 Carrer Camp de Mart
description: Ideal parking for visiting with bar and park around. Only the central part of the car park can be used for motorhomes

name: Càmping Mas Patxet
title: (17811) Càmping Mas Patxet
description: Camping very unknown but very cool, excursions with good children, Santa Pau, the Salt Can Batlle, volcanoes... At the bar you can eat well, tad expensive, but there are barbecues and shady perfect season

title: (17006) Girona - Carrer del Poble Sahrauí
description:
Quiet parking in the center of Girona.  
We stayed there (sleeping in the car) 1 night in the middle of August and it was empty ! There are several trees so it's perfect for the mornings. 
It is front of Aldi, Lidl, and McDonalds (you can charge your phone there, go to the bathroom and have free wifi) I didn't have any problem during the night and the morning

title: (17004) Girona - 9 Carrer de la Muralla
description: University parking only weekends. We have slept there with our 7 meter nasturtium and no problems. 1 minute from the entrance by the wall and scarce 5 of the cathedral. Ideal for vans

title: (17734) Albanyà - Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont
title_short: (17734) Albanyà - Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont
description: Small flat space for a van, maybe for two, with some beautiful monastery ruins to visit. The road is frequented by cyclists

address.street: Carr. de Mare de Deu del Mont

title: (17004) Girona - 9 Carrer de la Muralla
description: In the street next to the university parking lot we had no problem parking at night, quiet area. In the morning there was more car noise.

title: (17734) Beuda - Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont
title_short: (17734) Beuda - Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont
description: Pla de Sous, space at the coast of the road, in the middle of nature, planer and tranquil. Perfect for campers.

address.street: Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont

title: (17002) Girona - 9 Carrer Juli Garreta
description: Senderismo

title: (17734) Beuda - Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont
title_short: (17734) Beuda - Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont
description: Parking land and gravel, fairly flat, sanctuary with bar, restaurant, wc ... service 50m. Excellent views of the Girona region, it is generally common to find views full of clouds and even to be in the middle of the clouds.

address.street: Carretera de Mare de Deu del Mont

title: (17190) Salt - 24 Carrer de Pere Bosch i Gimpera
title_short: (17190) Salt - 24 Carrer de Pere Bosch i Gimpera
description: Quiet place, secluded and undisturbed by anyone.  Perfect for people who have a dog, you can walk very well. It is not advisable to leave the vehicle there for a long time, it is Salt

address.street: 24 Carrer de Pere Bosch i Gimpera

title: () Argelaguer - Camí de Sant Jaume de Llierca a la Miana
title_short: () Argelaguer - Camí de Sant Jaume de Llierca a la Miana
description: Nice and very quiet place to spend the night

address.street: Camí de Sant Jaume de Llierca a la Miana

title: (17853) Tortellà -
description: Shaded car park by the swimming pool, close to the road, with picnic tables, bins and a water point as well as a children's play area. The parking lot is slightly sloping. For small motorhomes, vans or vans. Not suitable for large motorhomes. This car park is ideal out of season when the swimming pool is closed.

title: (17172) Les Encies -
description: Wooded area for picnic and night

title: (17853) Tortellà - 2 Carrer us Puigferrer Compositor
description: Good place to stop and continue. There are containers and a small park. Near the center of town.

title: (17811) Santa Pau - 16 Carrer del Pont
description: Public toilets, very clean. I'm not sure of the opening hours, but it opens at 7am. Overnight stay is not allowed, only parking.

title: (17811) Santa Pau -
description: Fenced land with security cameras, in the town of Santa Pau (Girona), of 400m2, next to the Volcà Simó. Easy to settle in, animals are allowed, it has a sunrise and sunset with incredible views and views of the horses that we have on our farm. Access by car and camper is allowed, we are 15 minutes from the town on foot and you can walk the route of the volcanoes from our location. Ideal for cycling and hiking routes. Horseback riding, motorcycles, etc... Ideal for families and total disconnection in nature. The gastronomy and the beauty of the town is fascinating. Contact for reservation: tel.

title: (17003) Girona - 2 Carrer Barcelona

title: (17811) Santa Pau - 32 Avinguda dels Volcans
description:
Free parking all year, planned for 25 motorhomes in the middle of nature. It is located 5 minutes from the medieval town of Santa Pau, very beautiful and with many walks nearby.

The only place authorized to spend the night in the entire municipality of Santa Pau: at the end of the dirt parking lot. If you spend the night in another place you can be fined.

The overnight stay is free but it is necessary to book through the tourism website (Visit Santa Pau) by filling out a form.

The bathrooms are open at the same times as the tourist office.
The garbage cans are at the entrance and are only open from 8 to 10 am.

title: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
title_short: (17242) Quart - Avda. de la Bòbila s/n
description:
Free area for RVs no limit nger than 6.5 meters including water, grey water/potty emptying facilities  
much glass before the cleaning Place!!!
 5 spots for overnight parking (all free of charge). There are also recycling bins right next to the parking, plus a small neighbourhood "supermarket" a few blocks away. There's also a biking route nearby the leads to Girona in one direction (6 km) and Sant Feliu de Guíxols in the other (a tad further...35 km).

Very quiet at night, but a different story in the morning, as it's adjacent to a nursery school (you can guess the rest). Also worth noting: If you're coming from Girona and your navigator suggests the first exit to Quart, take into account that it involves going under a bridge with a 3m height limit, but there's another exit a few hundred metres further.

Please DO remember that this space is shared with local residents--it's actually the parking for the nursery school, so please be discreet and civil. Having spoken to the mayor (who I ran into by mere chance, and is very friendly and understanding), I can confirm that they don't mind us using some of the other spots not reserved for motorhomes, but 1) Only use the spots in the first row, next to the free facilities and 2) PLEASE do not park sideways: it's OK if you stick out a bit, but 3 RVs taking up 15 parking spots in NOT OK. It's rare to find FREE spots like this, so please be respectful, if not out of gratitude, for continuity's sake, or in the long run they'll end up being removed. Whether we choose to see it this way or not, we *are* indeed a community, our actions will surely affect those who come after us.

description: Public toilets next to the social center/doctor's office/village library.
